items.content_html: This Weather App is a lightweight and responsive web application built with React.js that provides users with real-time weather updates for any location worldwide. The app fetches data from a weather API and displays crucial information like the current temperature, humidity, and wind speed.
items.title: Dhruvaryan-10/Weather-App: This Weather App is a lightweight and responsive web application built with React.js that provides users with real-time weather updates for any location worldwide. The app fetches data from a weather API and displays crucial information like the current temperature, humidity, and wind speed.
